description:
The four Arayashiki leaders represent the Four Symbols of the Chinese constellation, corresponding to the four mythological creatures.
The creature of the East is Seiryuu (青龍), the Azure Dragon.
At first, Seiryuu suggests to remain passive; facing http://anidb.net/ch40600 [Byakko]`s allegation she would hand over the already awakened http://anidb.net/ch40719 [Yoriko] to http://anidb.net/ch40610 [Darklore] unopposed, Seiryuu then suggests to use http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] as mindbreaker.
name: Arayashiki East
